special_text:
[+1]: Draw a card, then target opponent may pay 2 life. If they do, discard a card.
[-2]: Return target creature to its owner’s hand, then that player discards a card.
[-6]: You get an emblem with “Your opponents play with cards they own from outside the game revealed. You may play them and spend mana as though it were mana of any type to cast them.”
